name: ANDS Data Capture Project
short_description:
A customized GeoNetwork Version 2.7 to enable translating metadata from sensor observation service (SOS) v1.0 to ANDS RIFCS v1.3. All SOS metadata are published to ANDS via OAI-PMH protocol. The product uses the same license as GeoNetwork 2.7. Installation guide can be found in file 'system_administrator_manual.txt' through 'Download' button. Other related documents such as User Guide and Developer Guide can also be found through 'Download' button.
This project is supported by the Australian National Data Service (ANDS) through the National Collaborative Research Infrastructure Strategy Program and the Education Investment Fund (EIF) Super Science Initiative.
summary: Data Capture of statewide hydrological data sets
